attributes.action: BBC to have rights to show all of Formula 1
attributes.additional_details:
BskyB now has the rights to show all the races with the BBC entitled to show 1/2 the races from 2012 onward.
.
We want to see F1 back on the BBC for many years to come, and not have to deal with SKY's coverage which will be full of Ads like ITV used to have & families not able to afford the SKY service.
